title: Bareburger
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain restaurants offering primarily burgers. Uses natural and organic ingredients, and marks vegan and gluten-free choices. Customize your burger by choosing a patty, bread or wrap, and toppings. The vegan suitable patties are black bean, veggies & quinoa, and portabello mushroom. Has vegan cheese.
